thread.title: Ground News - Warrant issued for man who was stranded on Jacksonville Beach after marooning, arrested earlier this month
thread.title_full: Ground News - Warrant issued for man who was stranded on Jacksonville Beach after marooning, arrested earlier this month

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Warrant issued for man who was stranded on Jacksonville Beach after marooning, arrested earlier this month
text:
Summary by Ground News John Rehman said his 40-foot sailboat lost power, forcing him to swim to shore. He received a citation Nov. 4 from the Florida Fish & Wildlife Commission. He was arrested on Dec. 13 by Jacksonville Beach Police Department and released. He later said he intended to stay in Jacksonville. Share menu More
